item.title: Unwinding Bitcoin Coinjoins - Tumblers, Wasabi, JoinMarket
item.description: podcast: https://stephanlivera.com/episode/179/ Stephan Livera: Hi Ergo, welcome to the show. Ergo: Hey Stephan. Thanks for having me back. Stephan Livera: It’s great to chat with you, and I know you’ve been doing a lot of awesome work, so I’m really excited to get into it and discuss with you. So I know you’ve got two reports that you have put out recently with OXT Research. So let’s start with the China and North Korea one.
